FABIAN POELS

Likes

  • Moving across rock surfaces in various directions
  • Shitting in the woods
  • Digging holes for shitting in the woods
  • Brewing coffee
  • Taking pictures of rocks with people on them
  • Waking up without an alarm clock

Profession

  • Teaching people how not to die when climbing
  • Inducing monkey-like behavior in kids aged 9 - 16
  • Transforming talented skiers into mediocre snowboarders
  • Fulltime teacher and pupil at the school of life

Most memorable ascents

  • La Sylvia(7c, Freyr, Belgium)~ 30m of typical Freyr-limestone climbing, one of my personal favorites
  • Malagueña salerosa(7a, Margalef, Spain)~ First 7a onsight, a personal milestone I believed to be impossible when I first started climbing
  • Ardéchoice quality(7a, Mazet plage, Ardèche, France)~ Still one of the best 7a's i've climbed so far. Perfect rock, striking line, technical climbing, runout when it gets easier, a must do when you're in the neighbourhood
  • Tour Termier: Boucs en stocks(TD 270m 6b+, 6a+ obligatoire, Tour Termier, France)~ Cruising on good rock with a nice top-out and stunning views over the Ecrins
